messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Tomoe-Gozen
messages.msgSnippet: ... Mr. Rogers: PLEASE, if you are going to change the subject, change the subject heading. I ve explained this several times in the last week or so. Your
messages.messageBody:
--- will rogers <war3271200@...> wrote:

>
> Can someone tell me what battles Lady Tomoe fought
> in?

Mr. Rogers:

PLEASE, if you are going to change the subject, change
the subject heading. I've explained this several times
in the last week or so. Your question is NOT about
Korean battles, which was the original thread topic,
so kindly start a new thread by changing the subject
heading.

As for battles in which Tomoe-Gozen fought, try a
search on Minamoto (Kiso) Yoshinaka--she was with him
in most of his battles.



__________________________________
Do you Yahoo!?
Meet the all-new My Yahoo! - Try it today!
http://my.yahoo.com

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Korean Invasion
messages.msgSnippet: Can someone tell me what battles Lady Tomoe fought in? burker1@aol.com wrote:My pleasure.  Needless to say, if anyone has a reference that is not on my list,
messages.messageBody:
Can someone tell me what battles Lady Tomoe fought in?

burker1@... wrote:My pleasure. Needless to say, if anyone has a reference that is not on my
list, please let me know. I will be updating the list from time to time. And
if anyone has one of the articles that is listed under my "need to get list",
please share that with me as well.

My top priority is to get a copy of the Korean Defense Department booklet.

Bob Burke


In a message dated 1/23/05 10:55:03 AM, junkmail@... writes:

<<
Nice work Bob!
and you done us all a huge favor by sharing, this'll make research a
whole lot easier for others.
Thanks,
-t

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Korean Invasion
messages.msgSnippet: My pleasure.  Needless to say, if anyone has a reference that is not on my list, please let me know.  I will be updating the list from time to time.  And if
messages.messageBody:
My pleasure. Needless to say, if anyone has a reference that is not on my
list, please let me know. I will be updating the list from time to time. And
if anyone has one of the articles that is listed under my "need to get list",
please share that with me as well.

My top priority is to get a copy of the Korean Defense Department booklet.

Bob Burke

Thanks,
